helpDescription: Returns a list of usable commands with the bot
loveUsingOurBot: Élvezed a GEEK Music társaságát? [Add hozzá]({invite}) a saját szerveredhez!
donateDescription: Returns the donation link to support the bot's maintainment
donateSubscribe: You love using GEEK Music? Consider [donating](https://donate.maitregeek.eu)!
pongText: from `m336_`'s servers, it's probably his fault if it's slow af
profileDescription: Returns various informations such as your total listening time using the bot
waitLeaderboard: Kérlek várj a ranglista frissítésére a parancs ismételt használata előtt
statusDescription: Returns some technical informations about the bot
wrongFilter: Invalid filter, please use one of these:
desilencerDescription: Autómatikusan eltávolítja a csendet a számban
sameChannel: Ugyan abban a csevegőszobában kell lenned
leftChannel: I' have left the channel. See you again!
lyricsDescription: Get lyrics for the ongoing song
lyricsExample: Használat: /lyrics title:<Song Title> vagy hagyd üresen a jelenlegi számhoz való kereséshez
moveDescription: Switch a song's position in the queue
positionfromDescription: The position of the song you want to move from
positiontoDescription: The position of the song you want to move to
negativeIndexes: This song cannot be moved, negative indexes do not exist
moveToCurrentPosition: Biztosan el szeretnéd mozgatni a számot a jelenlegi helyéről?
moveToLast: {user} elmozgatta a {song} számot az utolsó pozícióba
playDescription: Játssz le számokat a YouTube/Stream/Fájlok/Spotify/Soundcloud/Deezer/AppleMusic és más helyekről
musicDescription: Zene címe vagy SoundCloud, Spotify, YouTube, NewGrounds, Deezer, Apply Music, Tidal link bemásolása
fileDescription: Zene fájl (támogatja a videó és hangfájlokat is)
playExample: Usage: /play music:<Title or Link> or /play file:<Audio File | Video File>
joinPermission: Engedélyekre van szükségem ahhoz, hogy csatlakozzak a csevegőszobához
speakPermission: Engedélyekre van szükségem ahhoz, hogy beszélni tudjak a csevegőszobában
wrongFile: Ez a fájl nem hang vagy videó kiterjesztés
pleaseWaitPlaylist: Kérlek adj nekünk egy kis időt, ha egy lejátszási lista
noRadio: It seems I couldn't find any radio stations while searching for '{query}'...
titleDescription: A zene címe, amit meg szeretnél találni
chooseNumber: Válaszd ki a zene számát, amit le szeretnél játszani
positionSkipTo: Az elem pozíciója, ahova ugrani szeretnél
playlistAddExample:
Használat: /playlist-add zene:<Music Title | Link> | fájl:<Audio | Video File> 
Ha nem adsz meg zenét vagy fájlt a jelenlegi listát adja hozzá a lejátszási listához
queueAddedToPlaylist: A listát sikeresen hozzáadtuk a lejátszási listához
songAddedToPlaylist: {song} hozzá lett adva a lejátszási listához
playlist-moveDescription: Mozgass el egy számot a lejátszási listádban
userDescription: Válassz egy felhasználót (ha üresen hagyod te leszel az)
playlist-removeDescription: Eltávolít egy számot a lejátszási listádból
playlist-deleteDescription: Delete your playlist, will remove all songs from it
playlist-renameDescription: Rename a playlist to a new name
playlist-newnameDescription: The new name you want for the playlist
playlist-listDescription: Get a list of all your playlists
contactUs: Ha úgy véled hiba történt vedd fel velünk a kapcsolatot [a szerverünkön](https://discord.gg/R89GmN3cGG)
voteForUs: Ha élvezted a GEEK Music - kal töltött időt, [szavazz ránk a top.gg-n](https://top.gg/bot/971868710237274174/vote)!
volumeUpText: {user} felvette a hangerőt, jelenleg {volume}% - on játszódik a zene
volumeDownText: {user} levette a hangerőt, jelenleg {volume}% - on játszódik a zene
ticketDescription: Nyiss egy jegyet, egy hiba bejelentéséhez
ticketSent: A jegyét sikeresen elküldtük a hibakezelési csapat felé
languageDescription: Változtasd meg a nyelvet, amelyben a bot válaszol neked
wrongLanguage:
Nem megfelelő nyelvet adtál meg. Kérlek próbálkozz újra egy jóval. __Példa a formátumra: 'ru, fr, en'.
Nézz utána itt: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639_language_codes
languageText: A nyelved sikeresen meg lett változtatva **{new_language}** - re
playlistProblemOccured: Hiba lépett fel a lejátszási listád lekérése közben. Úgy tűnik baj van a bot - tal. Nyugodtan készíts egy hibajelentési jegyet, hogy értesíts minket róla.
searchPlatformDescription: Az a platform, ahol egy számot szeretnél megtalálni
searchError: Hiba lépett fel a szám lejátszása közben. Kérlek próbáld újra
nothingFound: Nem találtam semmit a keresés során
autoradioDescription: Rádió generálása bizonyos stílus vagy téma alapján
problemTranslation: Hibát találtál a fordításban? Segíts nekünk a fordításban!
giveMoney: Élvezed az időd a GEEK Music - kal és szeretnéd kimutatni? Fogadunk adományokat!
songFound: Successfully found a song! Starting to load it...
songErrorDuringSkipped: An error happened while playing the song so it was skipped
songErrorSkipped: An error happened while loading the song so it was skipped
songsErrorSkipped: An error happened while loading multiple songs so they were skipped
youLikedDonate: If you liked using GEEK Music, you can [support us by donating](https://donate.maitregeek.eu)!
clearDescription: Clear the bot state in your channel (clean the issues)
clearText: Successfully cleared the queue on this serveur. If the bot's still stuck contact us on [our support server](https://discord.gg/R89GmN3cGG)!
musicRequestTitlePlaceholder: Enter the song Title or its URL
songErrorSkippedWithName: An error happened while loading {song} so it was skipped
creditsTxt: List of all contributors to this project is available [here]({link})
apiDown:
The bot's API seems to be down, please retry later. 
If this issue persists contact us
requestFailed:
Request to the bot's API failed, please retry later. 
If this issue persists contact us
invalidNewName: Please type a valid new name for your playlist
customInstance:
### 🎉 NEW CUSTOM INSTANCE TIERS AVAILABLE! 🎉
🚀 **Tired of lag?** Get your own **dedicated GEEK Music bot** with ultra-fast responses, custom branding, and premium performance!

**💎 Starting at just $3/month! 💎**
Satisfied or your money back ;]

✨ **Contact maitregeek** by dm or send a **/ticket** to get started!
allQueueSkipped: Seems like the song(s) you tried failed...
youtubeDown:
**YouTube is down or the track you tried didn’t work.**

⚠️ If YouTube is down, Spotify, Deezer, and Tidal won’t work either. See [this guide]({documentationLink}) for details.

✅ If at least one instance is 🟢 on [the status page]({statusLink}), the system *should* work.
feedbackAd:
### 🎵 Want to help improve the bot? 
Share your feedback with us! ✨ 

It only takes a minute: [Click HERE](<https://l.maitregeek.eu/gm-feedback>)
nextPlayDescription: Whether this song should be played immediately after the current one or not
platformsDescription: Get all platforms supported by the bot
platformsText: The platforms list can be found by clicking [here]({platformsLink})
suggestionDescription: Send a suggestion for the bot to the development team
suggestDescriptionPlaceholder: Please describe your suggestion with details
suggestSent: Your suggestion has been sent to our teams successfully
multipleSongsAddedToPlaylist: {songNumber} songs have been added to your playlist
emptySongRequest: There's no song in your request
playlist-add-multipleDescription: Add multiple songs to your playlist at once. Separate them with a comma
music-multipleDescription: Music titles or links separated by commas, from SoundCloud/Spotify/YouTube/Deezer/AppleMusic/others
play-multipleDescription: Add multiple songs to your queue from YouTube/Stream/Spotify/SoundCloud/Deezer/AppleMusic/others
multipleSongsFound: Successfully found {songNumber} songs! Starting to load them...
multipleSongsAddedToQueue: Have been added to the queue
soundcloudUnavailable: The owner of this bot deactivated Soundcloud, you can't play songs from Sondcloud
404Spotify: Spotify didn't find anything. If it's a playlist made by Spotify (like Daily Mix, Discover Weekly, or Top Songs), we can't access it. To use it, add the songs to one of your own public playlists and try again with that link
songFileEmpty: The song link is empty or invalid. Please check if the link is correct
playlist-exportDescription: Export your playlist to a text file or JSON
playlistExported: Playlist `{playlistName}` exported successfully! You can download the file below
playlist-export-typeDescription: Choose a file type for export
exportFileNotSupported: This export file format isn't supported
premium-statusDescription: Check your premium status or someone else's
premium-reloadDescription: Force the bot to re-check your premium status. Useful if your subscription isn't detected
premium-infosDescription: Get details about premium benefits and usage
premiumInvalidCommand: This command is invalid. Please use a valid subcommand
premiumReloadButton: Click here to refresh your premium status
premiumReloadCooldown: You're on cooldown. Please wait {time} before trying again
notPremiumBot: This bot doesn't have premium enabled, so this command is unavailable
premiumInfos:
### Premium Status

🟢 Premium is **enabled**
👥 Total premium users: **{number}**

💎 Want to subscribe? [Click here]({premiumLink})
premiumReloadSuccess: ✅ Your premium status has been refreshed successfully
premiumReloadFail: ⚠️ Failed to update your premium status. Please try again. If the issue persists, open a `/ticket`
notPremium:
🚫 You need a premium subscription to use this bot.

💎 You can subscribe via our [Patreon]({premiumLink}) to get access.

⚠️ Make sure you have:
1. Linked your Discord account to Patreon
2. Joined our [Support Server]({supportLink}) — leaving it will remove your premium status

### Premium Benefits:
- ⚡ Much faster response times compared to the main bot
- 🎵 Smoother audio with less lag
- 📺 Slightly better YouTube support (more stable)
- 🙌 Helps support the development team

🆓 All features are also available for free on our main bot: [Click here to invite it]({nonPremiumInvite})
premiumLaunch:
💎 **GEEK Music Premium** is live!
Just **$1/month** for:
- ⚡ Faster response times
- 🎵 Smoother audio (less load)
- 📺 More stable YouTube playback

🔗 [Subscribe on Patreon]({premiumLink})
🔐 Link your Discord + stay in the [Support Server]({supportLink}) to keep access.

ℹ️ Same features as the main bot — just better performance
playlist-importDescription: Import a playlist from a JSON or TXT file
playlist-fileDescription: A JSON or TXT file containing a list of songs
playlistImported: {songNumber} songs have been successfully imported to your playlist.
fileTooLarge: The file is too large to be processed.
importFileNotSupported: The uploaded file format is not supported.
fileEmpty: The file is empty or doesn't contain any songs.
invalidJsonFormat: The JSON file format is invalid.
